teams.name: Semester at Sea
teams.loan_because: Our eyes were opened.
teams.description: A group of alumni from Semester at Sea's voyages around the world.

teams.name: Brigham Young University
teams.loan_because: We went to learn and have since graduated and gone out to serve.
teams.description: BYU is a school with a high level of standard in not only academia but moral conduct and service. Many of the students have spent a year and a half or two years living abroad, learning a language and culture while serving the people.

teams.name: Kiva Mormons
teams.loan_because: "A man filled with the love of God is not content with blessing his family alone, but ranges through the whole world, anxious to bless the whole human race." ~ Joseph Smith
teams.description: Members and friends of the Church of Jesus Christ of Latter-day Saints who are also Kiva lenders.

teams.name: Team Hawaii
teams.description: Team Hawaii is for Kama'aina as well as everyone who feels a connection to this special place.

teams.name: GLBT (Gay, Lesbian, Bisexual, Transgender) Kivans & Friends
teams.loan_because: We are out and proud and know what it is like to face barriers. We are privileged to help our entrepreneurs achieve their own equality. We thank our friends who join us in our loans & in supporting GLBT rights.
teams.description: We are gay, lesbian, bisexual, transgender, homosexual, and heterosexual people from all over the world.

teams.name: Kiva Christians
teams.loan_because:
Pure and undefiled religion before God the Father is this: to care for orphans and widows in their misfortune and to keep oneself unstained by the world. (Jam. 1:27) http://whoisjesus-really.com/

Link to information regarding Christian partners       
http://goo.gl/LU3hzz
teams.description: A group of believers in Jesus Christ, brought together through a common purpose: to help those in need around the world.

teams.name: The Clean Space Partnership
teams.loan_because: We believe in giving disadvantaged people a chance to make it for themselves - it's the principle behind our business.
teams.description: We are employees, friends and associates of The Clean Space Partnership - an ethical cleaning company in the UK. We are a unique group of individuals who care about the planet and the people in it.

teams.name: hi5 Community on Kiva!
teams.loan_because: “Kiva’s principles of entrepreneurship, serving a global community, and leveraging the power of crowds are very complementary to hi5’s mission, so it seems only natural that we join them in the fight to help eradicate poverty in many parts of the developing world,” said Ramu Yalamanchi, CEO of hi5. “By linking our user base with the profiles of Kiva entrepreneurs, we are connecting a diverse group of people who want to change our world for the better and ensure the right resources exist to do it.”
teams.description: Headquartered in San Francisco, hi5 is one of the world’s largest and fastest growing social networks and mobile web networks. Our focus is to empower our users to build and maintain connections between friends and family online. With over 56 million unique visitors every month, hi5 is a top 20 website globally and the number one social network in 31 countries across Latin America, Europe, Asia and Africa. The service is available in 37 languages, delivering localized content and applications to users worldwide.

teams.name: The Barefoot Investor
teams.loan_because: We believe everyone can tread their own path.

teams.name: hi5 Community on Kiva!
teams.loan_because: “Kiva’s principles of entrepreneurship, serving a global community, and leveraging the power of crowds are very complementary to hi5’s mission, so it seems only natural that we join them in the fight to help eradicate poverty in many parts of the developing world,” said Ramu Yalamanchi, CEO of hi5. “By linking our user base with the profiles of Kiva entrepreneurs, we are connecting a diverse group of people who want to change our world for the better and ensure the right resources exist to do it.”
teams.description: Headquartered in San Francisco, hi5 is one of the world’s largest and fastest growing social networks and mobile web networks. Our focus is to empower our users to build and maintain connections between friends and family online. With over 56 million unique visitors every month, hi5 is a top 20 website globally and the number one social network in 31 countries across Latin America, Europe, Asia and Africa. The service is available in 37 languages, delivering localized content and applications to users worldwide.

teams.name: The Clean Space Partnership
teams.loan_because: We believe in giving disadvantaged people a chance to make it for themselves - it's the principle behind our business.
teams.description: We are employees, friends and associates of The Clean Space Partnership - an ethical cleaning company in the UK. We are a unique group of individuals who care about the planet and the people in it.

teams.name: Australia
teams.loan_because:
Australians all let us rejoice
for we are young and free,    -   
We've heard the call of nations wide,
How can we let this be?    -   
We'll share our wealth,
We'll make the change,
We'll help to set them free   -   
From us to them
and back again, 
As one we all shall be      - 

(Thanks to member Jean for this one)

Find us on Facebook at http://www.facebook.com/group.php?gid=97953452142
teams.description: Kiva Loaners in Australia

teams.name: Bozea
teams.loan_because:
Nous croyons dans le micro crédit car c’est une approche proactive apportant un réel changement dans la vie de gens que nous ne connaissons pas et peut-être ne connaitrons jamais.
Pour un artisan, l’accès au micro crédit est souvent l’unique moyen pour amorcer une production, à travers l’achat de matériel ou de matière première ; une démarche que nous nous devons de soutenir.

--- English message ---
we think that it is a proactive approach to bring a real change in the lives of people we don't know and, perhaps, would never get to know.
teams.description:
Bozea.com est une marque de décoration de la maison permettant à des artisans du monde d’exprimer leur talent et de vendre leurs produits à travers sa plateforme.
A travers Bozea.com, nous proposons des objets uniques et de haute qualité, représentant une fusion entre cultures et traditions des régions d’où ils viennent.

--- English Message ---
Bozea is a home decoration brand providing platform to artisans to express their creativity. We bring unique and hard to find high quality original decorative items representing a fusion of culture and traditions of the regions they are coming from.

teams.name: University of Minnesota Kiva Team
teams.loan_because: Minnesota Nice is in all of us.
teams.description: Alumni, students, faculty and friends of the University of Minnesota.

teams.name: Houston Hearn
teams.loan_because: We lend money to make a difference in the world and in memory of Houston Hearn.

teams.name: Norway
teams.loan_because:
We have Cold Weather - Warm hearts !
We believe that providing microloans to entrepreneurs in developing countries is the socially responsive way of helping people break the circle of poverty. 

We promote Kiva.org as a sustainable and transparent way of connecting lenders and borrowers from across the globe.
teams.description:
Bruk denne linken for å invitere dine venner til teamet her:
http://www.kiva.org/team/norway/recruit

teams.name: Give Green - Environmental Loans
teams.loan_because: We want the world to be a better place.
teams.description:
Made of individual kiva lenders who are concerned about the environmental impacts of their loans. This is a forum to notify each other of environmentally sustainable loans that are needing funding. Sustainable development projects include recycling, solar, re-use, organic agriculture, health, etc. 

We support enterprises that care about the earth and all of its inhabitants. We have no religious, racial or political affiliations of any kind. We want to encourage sustainable enterprises that recycle, reuse, repurpose and use environmentally sound agricultural and manufacturing practices. 
Many of us would like Kiva to develop environmental standards or criteria for their lending practices to prevent environmental impacts that would increase poverty for future generations.
Many people want to have a green portfolio, or at least a green component. 
Won't you join us in creating true sustainability that includes a healthy environment?

teams.name: Wind Power Now
teams.loan_because: We want to make the world a better place.
teams.description: Wind power today for a better tomorrow.  Wind power emits no greenhouse gases, no air pollution and no water pollution and it uses no water.  It requires no mining or drilling for fuel, and it produces no hazardous waste. It is a tremendous rural development tool.  For more info, see http://www.yes2wind.com , a Web site on wind created by Friends of the Earth, Greenpeace and the World Wildlife Fund.

teams.name: Atheists, Agnostics, Skeptics, Freethinkers, Secular Humanists and the Non-Religious
teams.loan_because: We care about human beings and understand that it takes people to help people.
teams.description:
We are one human family, and we know that people can do good without believing in a god.

The Plus sign in the A+ Team logo reflects the fact that the team comprises Atheists, PLUS Agnostics, Skeptics, Freethinkers, Secular Humanists, and Non-Religious members.  A+ is also a symbol of excellence.

***TEAM WEBSITE***
http://apluskiva.wordpress.com/

***TEAM RESOURCES***

http://goo.gl/wtDkJ

www.tinyurl.com/AASFSHNR-MFIs

teams.name: Team Folkstugan
teams.loan_because: We want to give people a chance to improve their lives.
teams.description: Family and friends in the north of Sweden.

teams.name: Team Obama
teams.loan_because: We understand that our combined efforts through Kiva will help make this world a much better place!
teams.description: http://www.npr.org/templates/story/story.php?storyId=127545645

teams.name: Portugal
teams.loan_because:
Honramos o legado deixado pelos nossos antepassados que espalharam cultura, conhecimento e valores por todo o mundo. Onde há um português, há um amigo pronto a ajudar e dar esperança aos que mais precisam. Isto é Portugal.
~ ~ ~ ~ ~ ~
We honor the legacy of our ancestors who spread our culture, knowledge and values around the world. Wherever there is a Portuguese, there is a friend willing to help and give hope to those in need. This is Portugal.
teams.description: Portuguese Lenders Team

teams.name: Team F1online
teams.loan_because: We want to give people in developing countries a chance to establish their own business. For this reason we follow the motto „Give a jump-start and improve someone’s quality of life!“
teams.description:
We are a group of employees, clients and friends of F1online – one of Germany’s largest
independent stock photo agencies.

teams.loan_because: We are small businesses in the GTA helping entrepreneurs jump start their business around the globe.
teams.description: We believe KIVA is a great opportunity for small businesses across world to help each other. Therefore, our services at Red Wheel come with an embedded giving component, where we lend money to KIVA entrepreneurs on behalf of our clients.

teams.name: Joan's Team
teams.loan_because: There is a need.
teams.description: Our team is a legacy in honour of  Joan Butler (nee Carberry). Joan (also affectionately known as 'Nan') came to Canada from Nottingham,England as a War Bride.  She raised 8 children under trying conditions. Despite many challenges, she was always able to extend comfort to others and set an extra plate even during times when there was little to share.   She is a matriarch, mother, grandmother, great-grandmother, caregiver, nurturer, and friend.  Our team is composed of  family, friends and admirers bound by our love for her.  We participate in Kiva to demonstrate our love and respect as well as to honour her "spirit of generosity" and her continuing role in our lives.

teams.description:

independent stock photo agencies.

teams.name: Kakbank
teams.loan_because: Micro credits and minimuffins makes the world a little better!
teams.description:
We hook up once a month and eat cookies and invest in microcredits in developing countries. That makes us and the world a little happier!

Kakbank (the Cake bank, in Swedish) can be found several Swedish cities and abroad. Feel free to visit our website!

teams.name: Team Triiibes!
teams.loan_because: We care!
teams.description: We are a Triiibe of forward thinking people who want to pay-it-forward!

teams.name: Hackers
teams.loan_because: It's the right thing to do.
teams.description: A concerned group of hackers, yes those people messing with your computer, who care.

teams.name: JointWinWin
teams.loan_because: We believe in Business Growth to Shrink Poverty.
teams.description: Entrepreneurs and Businesses across the world who want to make a positive difference.

teams.name: Wake Forest University
teams.loan_because: we are fulfilling our motto: Pro Humanitate
teams.description: This group is for alumni, students, friends and supporters of the Demon Deacons who want to make a difference in the lives of those trying to help themselves

teams.name: Norwegian Developers
teams.loan_because: we should.

teams.name: Stand Sure Lenders
teams.loan_because: we feel it's important to share.
teams.description: A collection of people tied together by the bonds of family and friendship.

teams.name: Kiva Detroit
teams.loan_because: We want to champion small businesses in Detroit!
teams.description:
Kiva Detroit is the first Kiva City, a program where Kiva works with community organizations in the United States to provide local small businesses with microloans. 

The goal of the Kiva Detroit team is to empower Detroiters to champion local small businesses through Kiva. 

To double your impact, your loan to a Kiva Detroit borrower will be matched 1-to-1 by the Knight Foundation

teams.name: Wonga.com
teams.loan_because: We provide an innovative short-term cash advance service to consumers and really like what Kiva is doing with micro finance.
teams.description: Everyone at Wonga loves what Kiva is doing and gets a big kick from helping entrepreneurs in the developing world. We're entrepreneurs ourselves and so we understand the desire to change things for the better and take control of your destiny.

teams.name: The World's Smallest Bank
teams.loan_because: Community Cooperation goes a long ways for a lot of people.
teams.description: We're in it to win it!

teams.name: Dan Wilson
teams.loan_because: We have been blessed with goods and opportunities and Dan/Dad was all about reaching out to people.  We loan to honor him by passing blessing and opportunity on to others.
teams.description:
We are friends and family of Dan Wilson, a man of active faith who worked hard to raise 7children, a former dairyman, insurance guy,  wine connoisseur,and weather guru.
We would hope that team members would honor Dan by lending to those who connect in someway with who they knew Dan to be.

teams.name: Residencia Ágora Guesthouse Salamanca
teams.loan_because: para que nuestra comunidad pueda devolver un poquito a la comunidad mundial. Y para continuar la cadena de favores.
teams.description: Nuestro equipo es muy diverso. Somos gente joven, universitarios, involucrados con ayudar y compartir. Compartimos (la mejor) residencia estudiantil. Queremos la paz mundial. :)

teams.name: University of Michigan Alumni and Current Students
teams.loan_because: It's important to try to make a difference when and where you can.
teams.description: Kiva lenders with ties to the University of Michigan.

teams.name: Animal Lovers
teams.loan_because: Even as animals living in a developed country - we are better off  than humans in many parts of the world.
teams.description: We are animal lovers who want to help those less fortunate in the poor areas of the world.

teams.name: Kiva Austin Texas
teams.loan_because: We are big-hearted Texans and citizens of the world who enjoy sharing our prosperity and making a positive difference in the world.
teams.description:
a delightfully diverse group of Austinites. Be proud, Team Austin--our Kiva team is second only to NYC (with nearly 4X as many members!) for total lending for a city team. 
And a hearty WELCOME!! to all our new members.

teams.name: Phi Theta Kappa Texas Region
teams.loan_because: We want to be leaders for others, and want to help break the cycle of poverty.
teams.description: We are an International Honor Society of the Two year College, we are the Texas region, which has 5 districts which has over 80 chapters at many two year colleges. We promote students to be leaders in their communities as well as serve our communities. We also give a chance for those who excel in their studies to be awarded and acknowledge for their hard work in school.

teams.name: Team CANADA
teams.loan_because:
So little means so much. And because we are so fortunate to be able to lend with the luxury of not worrying about whether we ever see that money again, while the clients borrow with the hope and determination that they will be able to repay, and improve their lives along the way.

Check out fundraising loans already being supported by Team Canada:
http://www.kiva.org/team/team_canada/loans?status=fundRaising
teams.description: We're Canadian, eh?

teams.name: Sweden
teams.description: Sometimes it's easier to see that what a difference we each make by looking at what we do together -- And having more people together might even convince others to join and lend as well. Feel free to join up if you're a Kiva member in Sweden!

teams.name: Team Virginia
teams.loan_because: We give new meaning to the phrase "Commonwealth of Virginia."  We Virginians are thrilled to pool our common resources to help entrepreneurs all over the world as they improve their lives and their communities.
teams.description:
From the Appalachian Mountains to Virginia Beach (and equally welcoming of members outside the state), we are enthusiastic Kiva lenders privileged to have ties to the great state of Virginia. 
( Photo Copyright 2007 D L Ennis all rights reserved http://dlennis.wordpress.com )

teams.name: Jacob's Well
teams.loan_because: its amazing what one person can do to change the life of another.
teams.description:
We started this at Christmas time in 2008 and many have kept on going.  What a great way to make an impact in the world and keep making an impact.

Jacob's Well is a movement of people figuring out what the church can be like in today's world.

teams.name: Sweden
teams.description: Sometimes it's easier to see that what a difference we each make by looking at what we do together -- And having more people together might even convince others to join and lend as well. Feel free to join up if you're a Kiva member in Sweden!

teams.name: Kiva Team Germany
teams.loan_because: Showing interest in the life of others and giving a helping hand if needed is important.
teams.description: We are some fellows from Germany who believe in the concept of Kiva.

teams.name: Team Europe
teams.loan_because: We think Kiva is a unique opportunity for people all over the world to assist entrepreneurs in improving their businesses and communities.
teams.description: We are European lenders (EU, EFTA, and all those who feel they belong) who share the belief in Kiva's vision.

teams.name: Hanf, die ewige Blumenkraft
teams.loan_because:
Es liegt in unserer Natur und es ist das Richtige, dies hier zu machen!
Es ist sehr sinnvoll, Bauern rund um die Welt den Anbau von wertvollen Früchten zu ermöglichen und auch die Natur zu berücksichtigen.
teams.description:
Team Hanf ist eine Gruppe engagierter Personen und Firmen, die Bauern rund um die Welt unterstützen möchte, Früchte lokale und nachhaltig anzubauen oder zu verkaufen.

Hanf ist eine in Deutschland nur sehr in engen Grenzen (bzw. Teilen) nutzbare Pflanze. Es ist ein nicht hinnehmbarer Zustand, der geändert werden muss!

Durch die weltweite Prohibition von Cannabis (lateinisch für Hanf) sieht es in anderen Ländern ähnlich aus. Durch diese Prohibition ist eine Verwirrung entstanden, dass Hanf nur Rauschmittel sein könne.

Zum Ende des letzten Jahrtausends wurde gemerkt, dass dem nicht so ist.

Die Pflanze Hanf kann von der Blüte bis zur Wurzel genutzt werden!

teams.name: Berlin
teams.loan_because: it feels right.
teams.description: We are people from or connected with Berlin, Germany's most beautiful city and capital, who have been lucky enough to discover Kiva.

teams.name: Hamburg
teams.loan_because: we believe that entrepreneurship can start with small steps and develop to support and enhance whole communities.
teams.description:
We are a team for everyone originating from or loving Hamburg, a beautiful city in northern Germany.
Ein Team für alle Hamburger Deerns un Jungs und alle die es gerne wären.

teams.name: Team F1online
teams.loan_because: We want to give people in developing countries a chance to establish their own business. For this reason we follow the motto „Give a jump-start and improve someone’s quality of life!“
teams.description:
We are a group of employees, clients and friends of F1online – one of Germany’s largest
independent stock photo agencies.

teams.name: COUPONGOOD.ORG
teams.description: When you use the coupons at COUPONGOOD, many of the stores pay us a small sales commission on your purchases. A portion of that money keeps the site running, and the rest is loaned to the working poor of Uganda.

teams.name: Fat Wallet
teams.loan_because: we save money to do good for others.
teams.description: FatWallet's mission is to serve consumers with knowledge, value and guidance. It's like having a HALF MILLION friends to ask advice from, and all the rebates and coupons to make it happen at the lowest possible price.

teams.name: The Clean Space Partnership
teams.loan_because: We believe in giving disadvantaged people a chance to make it for themselves - it's the principle behind our business.
teams.description: We are employees, friends and associates of The Clean Space Partnership - an ethical cleaning company in the UK. We are a unique group of individuals who care about the planet and the people in it.

teams.name: women empowering women
teams.loan_because: empower a woman, change the world.

teams.name: hi5 Community on Kiva!
teams.loan_because: “Kiva’s principles of entrepreneurship, serving a global community, and leveraging the power of crowds are very complementary to hi5’s mission, so it seems only natural that we join them in the fight to help eradicate poverty in many parts of the developing world,” said Ramu Yalamanchi, CEO of hi5. “By linking our user base with the profiles of Kiva entrepreneurs, we are connecting a diverse group of people who want to change our world for the better and ensure the right resources exist to do it.”
teams.description: Headquartered in San Francisco, hi5 is one of the world’s largest and fastest growing social networks and mobile web networks. Our focus is to empower our users to build and maintain connections between friends and family online. With over 56 million unique visitors every month, hi5 is a top 20 website globally and the number one social network in 31 countries across Latin America, Europe, Asia and Africa. The service is available in 37 languages, delivering localized content and applications to users worldwide.

teams.name: Kiva Muslims
teams.loan_because:
002.271 Yusuf Ali Translation:
If ye disclose (acts of) charity, even so it is well, but if ye conceal them, and make them reach those (really) in need, that is best for you: It will remove from you some of your (stains of) evil. And Allah is well acquainted with what ye do.
teams.description: Insha'Allah our team will be a collaboration of people from all walks of life united by one goal: to help those less fortunate and displaying great appreciation to our creator for blessing us to help make a differerence in the world.

teams.name: Kiva Christians
teams.loan_because:
Pure and undefiled religion before God the Father is this: to care for orphans and widows in their misfortune and to keep oneself unstained by the world. (Jam. 1:27) http://whoisjesus-really.com/

Link to information regarding Christian partners       
http://goo.gl/LU3hzz
teams.description: A group of believers in Jesus Christ, brought together through a common purpose: to help those in need around the world.

teams.name: Give Green - Environmental Loans
teams.loan_because: We want the world to be a better place.
teams.description:
Made of individual kiva lenders who are concerned about the environmental impacts of their loans. This is a forum to notify each other of environmentally sustainable loans that are needing funding. Sustainable development projects include recycling, solar, re-use, organic agriculture, health, etc. 

We support enterprises that care about the earth and all of its inhabitants. We have no religious, racial or political affiliations of any kind. We want to encourage sustainable enterprises that recycle, reuse, repurpose and use environmentally sound agricultural and manufacturing practices. 
Many of us would like Kiva to develop environmental standards or criteria for their lending practices to prevent environmental impacts that would increase poverty for future generations.
Many people want to have a green portfolio, or at least a green component. 
Won't you join us in creating true sustainability that includes a healthy environment?

teams.name: hi5 Community on Kiva!
teams.loan_because: “Kiva’s principles of entrepreneurship, serving a global community, and leveraging the power of crowds are very complementary to hi5’s mission, so it seems only natural that we join them in the fight to help eradicate poverty in many parts of the developing world,” said Ramu Yalamanchi, CEO of hi5. “By linking our user base with the profiles of Kiva entrepreneurs, we are connecting a diverse group of people who want to change our world for the better and ensure the right resources exist to do it.”
teams.description: Headquartered in San Francisco, hi5 is one of the world’s largest and fastest growing social networks and mobile web networks. Our focus is to empower our users to build and maintain connections between friends and family online. With over 56 million unique visitors every month, hi5 is a top 20 website globally and the number one social network in 31 countries across Latin America, Europe, Asia and Africa. The service is available in 37 languages, delivering localized content and applications to users worldwide.

teams.name: Asbury First UMC
teams.loan_because: In support of Asbury's Vision 20/20, we support Kiva as a means of sharing the love of Christ through the practical application of kindness and charity.
teams.description: A community of Asbury First United Methodist Church dedicated to creating awareness about outreach opportunities and supporting the working poor in the developing world

teams.name: Catholic Kiva
teams.loan_because: It is the right thing to do.
teams.description: Anyone is welcome to join our group.  The team is just for fun and to help build community.

teams.name: Serena Kuo and Jon Koegler Wedding Registry
Team CANADA
teams.loan_because:
So little means so much. And because we are so fortunate to be able to lend with the luxury of not worrying about whether we ever see that money again, while the clients borrow with the hope and determination that they will be able to repay, and improve their lives along the way.

Check out fundraising loans already being supported by Team Canada:
http://www.kiva.org/team/team_canada/loans?status=fundRaising
teams.description: We're Canadian, eh?

teams.name: Church of the Flying Spaghetti Monster
teams.loan_because:
"Thou shalt share, that none may seek without funding."   A nod to VII.  of “RANDOM NUMBER OF NOT COMMANDMENTS, SUGGESTIONS"  in the LOOSE CANON:
http://www.loose-canon.info/page17.htm
teams.description:
Members of the Church of the Flying Spaghetti Monster  

Secular vs religious Field Partners, see links at http://atheist-monkey.blogspot.de/2009/08/kiva-mfi-checker.html

and

teams.name: Ad Rem Young Professionals
teams.description: Ad Rem Young Professionals is a Dutch professional recruitment company, specialising in the placement of young professionals with 0-5 years of work expercience in permanent, contract and temporary positions.

teams.description: Ad Rem Young Professionals is a Dutch professional recruitment company, specialising in the placement of young professionals with 0-5 years of work expercience in permanent, contract and temporary positions.

teams.description: Ad Rem Young Professionals is a Dutch professional recruitment company, specialising in the placement of young professionals with 0-5 years of work expercience in permanent, contract and temporary positions.

teams.name: Norway
teams.loan_because:
We have Cold Weather - Warm hearts !
We believe that providing microloans to entrepreneurs in developing countries is the socially responsive way of helping people break the circle of poverty. 

We promote Kiva.org as a sustainable and transparent way of connecting lenders and borrowers from across the globe.
teams.description:
Bruk denne linken for å invitere dine venner til teamet her:
http://www.kiva.org/team/norway/recruit

Det er flott hvis du trykker Facebook "anbefale/recommend" knappen oppe til høyre  på denne siden. Vår facebookgruppe: http://www.facebook.com/pages/Kiva-Norway/193432017389484

Anbefalte lån "sikrere" lån: 
http://www.kiva.org/lend?sortBy=partner_default_min=0&partner_default_max=0.5&partner_risk_rating_min=1&partner_risk_rating_max=5&partner_arrears_min=0&partner_arrears_max=1.1&sortBy=repaymentTerm
Hjelp med "expiring loans": http://poverty2prosperity.org/sosloans/#fundraising_loans

Hjelp med "postdisbursed" lån:
http://kivatools.com/fundraising/postdisbursedloans

Kiva tools:
https://www.kiva.org/portfolio/collections
http://www.bhodisoft.com/kiva-country-collector/

Da har vi nådd målet på 2 million dollar utlånt. Takk til alle som har bidratt!

teams.name: Thunderbird Global MBA community & friends
teams.whereabouts: Glendale, AZ and all over the world
teams.loan_because:
Thunderbird's mission statement is "We educate global leaders who create sustainable prosperity
worldwide", and Kiva's goals are consistent with our mission statement.
teams.description: We are affiliates of the Thunderbird Global School of Management, specifically Global MBA students.  The team is open to all current students, alums, professors, and friends.  We live and work all over the world, and are proud to be responsible global citizens and equally proud of our shared connection to Thunderbird.

teams.name: Washirika
teams.loan_because: We want to form partnerships with business people around the world.  (Washirika means "Partners" in Swahili)
teams.description: Family and friends of Ann Hingst, KF12.

teams.name: Friends of YOSEFO
teams.loan_because: we can't not!

teams.name: Kino Rotary Club
teams.loan_because: Our motto in Rotary is "Service Above Self". Kino Rotarians come together to do what we can to elevate the condition of our fellow human beings. We welcome other Rotarians or anyone who shares our goals of Rotary and Kiva.
teams.description: We are members of Rotary to give "Service Above Self" by promoting peace, health, economic equality and justice to all in our communities and around the world.

teams.name: The Social Deck
teams.loan_because: We want to promote entrepreneurship as means of improving social outcomes around the world.
teams.description:
The SOCIAL DECK is an independent social marketing agency passionate about helping organisations communicate and engage with individuals and communities.
We work across government, not-for-profit, industry, start-up businesses and social enterprises on projects that can help to make a difference to people’s lives. Our goal is to bring these sectors together to think about and implement new ways of engaging people and communities in actions that can improve personal well-being or help tackle bigger social and environmental issues. Our approach is to help facilitate action and change behaviours using practical engagement tactics and partnerships.

teams.name: Latvia
teams.loan_because: We believe that the entrepreneurs bring common wealth to their communities and can deal much bigger impact to the poverty issues around them then just simple donations crates. As the saying goes: "Give a man a fish, you feed him for a day. But if you give him a fishing rod, you feed him for a lifetime". Also the trust is the essential component and the "Kiva" project is the best place to prove everybody in the world that the trust we put in each other almost 100% pays back!
teams.description: People with pure intentions to help the world and make it a better place even with the smallest assets we can do good and completely change hundreds of people lives for better.

teams.name: LilithsCircle
teams.loan_because: We know we are all connected.
teams.description: A group of women who share a common concern for justice.

teams.name: Team Giddy Up
teams.loan_because: We believe that individuals who have the desire to work hard and build a business, deserve the opportunity to become economically independent, improve their standard of living, and alleviate poverty for themselves and their communities.
teams.description: We are a group of family, friends,and coworkers who appreciate the efforts by entrepreneurs around the globe and want to assist so they can succeed.

teams.name: Sweden
teams.description: Sometimes it's easier to see that what a difference we each make by looking at what we do together -- And having more people together might even convince others to join and lend as well. Feel free to join up if you're a Kiva member in Sweden!

teams.name: Myosho-ji Buddhist Temple
teams.loan_because: We believe that microloans to groups and individuals can be an effective way of enabling people to support themselves, change their lives and further enable all people to become happy.
teams.description: Buddhist temple in Charlotte, NC USA

teams.name: Kiva Walk
teams.loan_because: Because we know the benefit of someone providing a 'hand up' both in our work and throughout our life.
teams.description: Founded by a 8.5 month walk across the USA in 2010, the KivaWalk Lending Team is a growing movement of Kiva champions that use walking to teach and instill Kiva's mission while also connecting us to the profound benefits of life at 3mph.

teams.name: Kiva City
teams.loan_because: We support small business owners in the United States.
teams.description:
We support small businesses and want to do more to bring Kiva to cities in the U.S.

If you are interested in loaning to small business owners in the U.S. or if you want to help bring Kiva to your city, this team is a community to expand the reach of Kiva in America.

teams.name: Bridgespan Worldwide
teams.description: Bridgespan colleagues and alums!

teams.name: Kiva Jews
teams.loan_because: Tikkun Olam - making the world a better place.
teams.description: One of Judaism's most famous scholars, Maimonides, said that the highest form of charity is to help someone no longer need charity - and lending to Kiva does that.

teams.name: GLBT (Gay, Lesbian, Bisexual, Transgender) Kivans & Friends
teams.loan_because: We are out and proud and know what it is like to face barriers. We are privileged to help our entrepreneurs achieve their own equality. We thank our friends who join us in our loans & in supporting GLBT rights.
teams.description: We are gay, lesbian, bisexual, transgender, homosexual, and heterosexual people from all over the world.

teams.name: us3 AB
teams.loan_because: It's needed. We need to switch from support to make-it-happen.
teams.description: Let's make things better. For you, me, and your customer.

teams.name: Cats Are People Too.
teams.loan_because: We, the lovers of cats, loan  because it makes us sad to see how tragic are some lives simply because they are poor.  That can, and must change, and it will change.  The world can never be purrfect, but it can be happier!
teams.description: How can we cat lovers help you?  We don't have much, but we're willing to share, IF you are willing to help yourselves.  We only want for this world to be a better place, for everyone, even cats.

teams.name: Democratic Underground
teams.loan_because: We want to support those in need as they try to improve their lives.
teams.description: Interested and involved in progressive politics. (While we are all members of Democratic Underground, this Kiva team is not officially a part of DU.)

teams.name: The Social Deck
teams.loan_because: We want to promote entrepreneurship as means of improving social outcomes around the world.
teams.description:
The SOCIAL DECK is an independent social marketing agency passionate about helping organisations communicate and engage with individuals and communities.
We work across government, not-for-profit, industry, start-up businesses and social enterprises on projects that can help to make a difference to people’s lives. Our goal is to bring these sectors together to think about and implement new ways of engaging people and communities in actions that can improve personal well-being or help tackle bigger social and environmental issues. Our approach is to help facilitate action and change behaviours using practical engagement tactics and partnerships.

teams.name: Give Green - Environmental Loans
teams.loan_because: We want the world to be a better place.
teams.description:
Made of individual kiva lenders who are concerned about the environmental impacts of their loans. This is a forum to notify each other of environmentally sustainable loans that are needing funding. Sustainable development projects include recycling, solar, re-use, organic agriculture, health, etc. 

We support enterprises that care about the earth and all of its inhabitants. We have no religious, racial or political affiliations of any kind. We want to encourage sustainable enterprises that recycle, reuse, repurpose and use environmentally sound agricultural and manufacturing practices. 
Many of us would like Kiva to develop environmental standards or criteria for their lending practices to prevent environmental impacts that would increase poverty for future generations.
Many people want to have a green portfolio, or at least a green component. 
Won't you join us in creating true sustainability that includes a healthy environment?

teams.name: Poverty2Prosperity.org - Poverty-Escape
teams.loan_because: Poverty2Prosperity.org (P2P) is all about Poverty-Escape. Please join our fun team and put Poverty-Escape in the lead!  See how to get your I'm a Kiva Loaner Bracelet and more by participating on Team P2P - visit our web site for details!
teams.description:
One of P2P's major poverty-escaping projects is to participate in making microloans through the Kiva platform. See the web site for details on all of our projects. Also see our Perpetual Fund lender account which allows people to designate funds for perpetual loaning here on Kiva, http://www.kiva.org/lender/P2PPerpetualFund

We have a special purpose fund to keep loans from expiring. Please join us at http://poverty2prosperity.org/sosloans to see currently funding loans from the SOS Loan fund.

NOTE:  Poverty2Prosperity is also a non-profit, and any messages not related to Kiva or Poverty2Prosperity may be deleted.  If there is an idea you would like to share, contact one of the Team Captains to get permission.  Thank you for your consideration.

teams.name: Team Ghana
teams.loan_because: We believe that the people of Ghana has demonstrated their ability to form a successful democracy and a willingness to use their resources to further the development of Africa. We believe that by supporting the people of Ghana we will be assisting in the effort to pull families out of poverty one at a time.
teams.description: This team is open to all persons willing to make a contribution to the future development of Ghana/Africa. However persons of African ancestry are especially invited to join and contribute.

teams.name: Clareo Partners
teams.loan_because:
Kiva is a perfect fit. Clareo Partners is a consulting firm focusing on innovation and we think that Kiva’s peer-to-peer model for lending is one of the most powerful innovations to raise people out of poverty around the world.  Kiva answers the desperate need for credit amongst the poorest of the poor. We understand how important small businesses are to any economy and how market forces can be used to permanently keep people out of poverty in a way that charity cannot. 

We also understand how important it is to provide general operating support, so we have made an additional $1,000 donation to Kiva to keep the lights on :)
teams.description: Our team is made up of the amazing men and women who work for Clareo Partners, our clients and additional friends. From providing small business consulting in Kyrgyzstan to helping one of our clients roll out a micro-franchise initiative in Ghana, Clareo knows that empowering small, local businesses is one of the best routes to sustainable prosperity for all people.

teams.name: Kiva Africa
teams.loan_because: We love Africa

teams.name: Woodinville High Class of 2009 Heritage Team
teams.loan_because: The Woodinville High Class of 2009 wants to make a positive, meaningful and lasting effect on the world. We also want to pass this new tradition on to each graduating class to come.
teams.description: We are a group of high school seniors who are thankful for what we have, and want to share, help others, and be positive world citizens.

teams.name: Earth-Team.org
teams.loan_because:
We know Microfinance works.

We know there is poverty in the world.

We know there are people who can change their own lives, if they have the means to do so.

We want to maximize the (economic, social, and human) return to each of our $25.

We believe that we can fight poverty with one thing called Love.

AND we believe in Rock n' Roll, Peace, Logic, and Love!
teams.description:
Join us if you want to fight poverty. 

Kiva group originally created by Toan Phan and Brian Conley on April 09, 2009

teams.name: Atheists, Agnostics, Skeptics, Freethinkers, Secular Humanists and the Non-Religious
teams.loan_because: We care about human beings and understand that it takes people to help people.
teams.description:
We are one human family, and we know that people can do good without believing in a god.

The Plus sign in the A+ Team logo reflects the fact that the team comprises Atheists, PLUS Agnostics, Skeptics, Freethinkers, Secular Humanists, and Non-Religious members.  A+ is also a symbol of excellence.

***TEAM WEBSITE***
http://apluskiva.wordpress.com/

***TEAM RESOURCES***
Secular Loans
http://goo.gl/wtDkJ

www.tinyurl.com/AASFSHNR-MFIs

http://www.kivalens.org/

KivaTools:
http://kivatools.com/

Toolkit for analyzing Kiva data:
http://build.kiva.org/

teams.name: Val's Pals
teams.loan_because: We want to remember Valerie Boshears. She died of cancer in 2002 at the young age of 47 and never complained and was courageous to the end.
teams.description: We all knew Val through the theater. She designed and sewed costumes for the San Jose Children's Musical Theater. Her daughter, RikkiAnn, performed with many of our children.

teams.name: Sweden
teams.description: Sometimes it's easier to see that what a difference we each make by looking at what we do together -- And having more people together might even convince others to join and lend as well. Feel free to join up if you're a Kiva member in Sweden!

teams.name: Caddywhompus
teams.loan_because: We believe the world economy is askew and individual lending is a small way to begin reducing  the gap between rich and poor.
teams.description: We are three generations of a family, ranging in age from 18 to 86. Our family includes Americans and Egyptians and we live in Massachusetts, California, Maryland, Virginia and Washington, D.C.

teams.name: Sweden
teams.description: Sometimes it's easier to see that what a difference we each make by looking at what we do together -- And having more people together might even convince others to join and lend as well. Feel free to join up if you're a Kiva member in Sweden!

teams.name: Team Obama
teams.loan_because: We understand that our combined efforts through Kiva will help make this world a much better place!
teams.description: http://www.npr.org/templates/story/story.php?storyId=127545645

teams.name: Kiva Mormons
teams.loan_because: "A man filled with the love of God is not content with blessing his family alone, but ranges through the whole world, anxious to bless the whole human race." ~ Joseph Smith
teams.description: Members and friends of the Church of Jesus Christ of Latter-day Saints who are also Kiva lenders.

teams.name: Nerdfighters
teams.loan_because:
We aim to decrease world suck.

And this is how:
www.eludehcs.no/kiva/nerdfighters/nerdfighters20120916.png by Nerdfighter Ole Bendik
teams.description:
We're Nerdfighters! We fight against suck; we fight for awesome! We fight using our brains, our hearts, our calculators, and our trombones.

Happy lending!

Follow us on twitter: https://twitter.com/KivaNerds

teams.name: Friends of Juhudi Kilimo
teams.loan_because: Juhudi is changing the way farmers do business.

teams.name: Kiva Team Germany
teams.loan_because: Showing interest in the life of others and giving a helping hand if needed is important.
teams.description: We are some fellows from Germany who believe in the concept of Kiva.

teams.name: Kiva Christians
teams.loan_because:
Pure and undefiled religion before God the Father is this: to care for orphans and widows in their misfortune and to keep oneself unstained by the world. (Jam. 1:27) http://whoisjesus-really.com/

Link to information regarding Christian partners       
http://goo.gl/LU3hzz
teams.description: A group of believers in Jesus Christ, brought together through a common purpose: to help those in need around the world.

teams.name: Team USA
teams.loan_because: We believe in the generosity of the human spirit that is still alive within Americans of all backgrounds.
